text: The scientist conducting groundbreaking research publishes her findings.

spans.label: SUBJECT
spans.reason: is a subject in this context, because this is the person or thing that the sentence is about.

spans.label: VERB
spans.reason: is a verb in this context, because this is the action that the subject performs.

spans.label: OBJECT
spans.reason: is an object in this context, because this is the person or thing that the action is done to.

spans.label: VERB
spans.reason: is a verb in this context, because this is the action that follows the first action.

spans.label: OBJECT
spans.reason: is an object in this context, because this is the result of the previous action.

text: The entrepreneur who founded the company sells it for a significant profit.

spans.label: SUBJECT
spans.reason: is a subject in this context, because this is the person or thing that the sentence is about.

spans.label: VERB
spans.reason: is a verb in this context, because this is the action that the subject performed.

spans.label: OBJECT
spans.reason: is an object in this context, because this is the entity that was created by the subject.

spans.label: VERB
spans.reason: is a verb in this context, because this is the action that follows the first action.

spans.label: OBJECT
spans.reason: is an object in this context, referring back to 'the company'.

spans.label: OBJECT
spans.reason: is an object in this context, describing the result of the selling action.

text: The artist painting a mural attracts attention from passersby.

spans.label: SUBJECT
spans.reason: is a subject in this context, because this is the person or thing that the sentence is about.

spans.label: VERB
spans.reason: is a verb in this context, because this is the action that the subject is currently performing.

spans.label: OBJECT
spans.reason: is an object in this context, because this is the thing that the subject is working on.

spans.label: VERB
spans.reason: is a verb in this context, because this is the action that is the result of the painting.

spans.label: OBJECT
spans.reason: is an object in this context, describing the effect of the artist's action.
